showScoreExcerpt:
“ ‘Spamalot’ is nothing but digressions and tangential wanderings from one silly situation to another, aided and abetted by a series of terrific songs that fit perfectly in tone and style with the goings-on...There's not a dull spot or misfire in the mix. Josh Rhodes directs and choreographs the evening with all the joy in the world, doing an exceptional job of keeping the dry humor dry and letting the outrageous side of the show go full bonkers.”
